abilities.name: Double Drive
abilities.text: This Pokémon may have up to 2 Pokémon Tool cards attached to it. If it loses this Ability, discard Pokémon Tool cards from it until only 1 remains.

attacks.name: Break Buster-GX
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
